website_summaries.verdict: High-quality scoreboard made for indoor use for multiple sports. Includes a convenient remote control.
pros: Numbers are large enough to be seen from a distance
Includes a battery backup system when an electrical outlet is not nearby
Works well for almost any indoor sport
Can keep time up or down from 99:99 and scores up to 199 points
cons: Will be a little small for some situations and games at just 16" x 24"

customer_reviews.title: Description is wrong, no battery backup.
customer_reviews.text: Love this scoreboard but disappointed that it doesn't come with a battery backup mode, even though its clearly stated in the product description (look in the From The Manufacturer section). The description clearly says it has one, says that you must charge the battery pack for 24 hours prior to use, but when I opened it up I saw that there was no charger or battery pack included. In fact, there no place to even connect one. Just be aware of this before you buy if it's something you need. We needed it but now have to run a 100' extension cord for this.
customer_reviews.author: FEEDOG

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I am in charge of our local youth basketball organization and we have 2 gyms that are used for games. The larger gym has a built in scoreboard but the smaller gym does not. I am extremely pleased with this product as it worked perfectly straight out of the box!! We used it this past weekend and I really like the program feature so I could set all of the times and have my 8th grade some run the clock in this gym. I cannot wait to get so much more use out of it!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. McBride

customer_reviews.title: 1st one defective. Replacement working so far.
customer_reviews.text: First one did not work. Plugged it in and lights just flash like there's a short in it. Sent it back for a replacement, which was annoying because I had to find time to get to a UPS dropoff and wait an additional 6 days to receive a working product. Kind of annoying they don't make sure they work before sending. Update: I got the replacement scoreboard. It worked as advertised at our youth basketball games this past weekend. Will update if it has any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Adam William

customer_reviews.title: Good Scoreboard
customer_reviews.text: Good tabletop scoreboard. Good price and quality. I have a few of these for a sports league that I run. Its not rated for outdoor use, but I have used for 2 or 3 outdoor events without issues. Its been visible even in heavy sunlight. I've been stuck in some damp drizzle weather conditions without issues, but you would not want to risk any use in true rain.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, with one flaw
customer_reviews.text: Works well, and the remote is a nice option. Only problem is the stupid shot clock. It runs automatically, and buzzes if you don't shut it off yourself - it can not be stopped with the remote, and always runs the first quarter of any game you start. Otherwise, a worth while purchase for a PE teacher or coach.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great company
customer_reviews.text: We use this outside actually, for Flag Football (only when the weather is dry of course) and they are great. The remote works from quite a far distance away from the unit. Recently, we purchased on because we thought we were missing a unit and we needed one quick. The company shipped in one day but then we found the missing unit and when we went to return this one, the company was great about it. Can't say enough good things about them and, no, I don't work for them! :)
customer_reviews.author: John Graziano

customer_reviews.title: Basic with poor build quality.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this digital scoreboard brand new and within a year it was faulty. I would recommend doing your research before purchasing. The digital scoreboard market as a whole is very small. There are not many options, I would also consider purchasing software and using a wall mount tv as an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 stars if you could reset the clock with the remote.
customer_reviews.text: Great little transportable unit. I use it to run my drills at basketball practice. Would be GREAT if you could reset the clock with the remote, even if just re-starting the time that was previously entered once more would be nice. You have to go to the unit and set the clock time, then from there you can start it and stop it with the remote, but setting the time must be done at the unit back. Other than that one flaw, it's a great unit with lots of features. GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE. remote broke in a week or two (most likely my fault from having it in my bag) but a new remote was sent quickly. Thanks for that!
customer_reviews.author: Tom O'Kane

customer_reviews.title: Late, but worth waiting for.
customer_reviews.text: The first one arrived in a very beat up product box and the remote function did not work. I contacted the manufacturer to find out if I was doing something wrong. Their very helpful tech man gave me some instructions, and when they did not work, he immediately set it in motion for a new one to be sent to me. Sadly, it arrived a few days after Christmas, but my grandson was patient. He is really enjoying using it while he plays his at home hockey games with his younger brother. It is a beautiful looking product and does what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Monda

customer_reviews.title: Good low-cost Scoreboard for Basketball
customer_reviews.text: Been using this scoreboard for a few weeks with an adult basketball league. Works perfectly, numbers are very bright, horn is decent. The remote is a nice addition for keeping score and starting/stopping time. It's pretty easy to train a new person on how to use it in just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: DenverDavid

customer_reviews.title: Great Scoreboard
customer_reviews.text: So far, we have only tinkered with this scoreboard, but it seems to work perfectly. The lights are very bright. The optional end of period buzzer is so loud, it startled us all the first time it sounded. This product was not cheap, but so far, it seems worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lawdog

customer_reviews.title: they often break.
customer_reviews.text: The scoreboards are set up nicely and easy to use. However, I have had several break and there is no way to get in touch with the manufacturer. It is confusing who the manufacturer is. Says MacGreggor made for BSN Sports. Impossible to get ahold of either company. MacGreggor doesnt existing anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product! Broken remote.
customer_reviews.text: The remote I received with this order did not work. I tried contacting BSN and have yet to receive a reply.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Burton

customer_reviews.title: Display doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and the display doesn't work!! Called manufacturer and they said to call someone different. So here we go with the run-around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was expensive but he is picky and he and his team really found it perfect. Says a lot
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my husband's use. It was expensive but he is picky and he and his team really found it perfect. Says a lot.
customer_reviews.author: SJB

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect. Used it all day on outdoor court never ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Used it all day on outdoor court never had problems. Does not come with chargeable battery like stated on description. Maybe description was for other model.
customer_reviews.author: KukoRoKuko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. We use it at a small basketball program
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. We use it at a small basketball program. The remote comes in handy when you don’t have someone to man the clock! It’s very loud sonyhw volume adjuster is great too. Easy to use. We had kids run the clock with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: BSN Multisport Indoor Tabletop Scoreboard
customer_reviews.text: This clock does a great job for my little league. The display is clear and distinct from far away. The built in buzzer can be heard over crowd noise. The remote is very convenient as well.
customer_reviews.author: James  Arnold

customer_reviews.title: This has been a very good substitute for now and we will continue to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when our school board control box stopped working. This has been a very good substitute for now and we will continue to use for PE classes and other events. Love the remote. The only complaint I have is that the "horn" sounds like a shrill whistle and is not as loud as I would like it when there is a larger crowd in our gym
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good choice. Sound quality is very good
customer_reviews.text: Works well in the gym or on the field. Good choice. Sound quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm for basketball tournament
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our useage. And remote was more than handy.
customer_reviews.author: Kerwin Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our resident athletic director said worked beautifully during holiday tournament!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kemp

customer_reviews.title: So useful to have around
customer_reviews.text: So useful to have around. Used it at games when the giant scoreboard was malfunctioning, and used it at practices as well...We bought a soft case separately for ease of care, storage and carrying.
customer_reviews.author: GWCS Press (Consignment)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a great addition for our room. Can set it up for workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: recieved item broken....
customer_reviews.text: it probably would have been great if it wasn't already broken by the time it got to me. didn't turn on, never got to experience how it works. needed it for a basketball tournament and because it didn't turn on we had to use cell phones and ipads.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This shot clock is great. I love it and would recommned it to anyone who is responsible for intramural basketball or otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: OlaRu

customer_reviews.title: Time In
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this product for our youth basketball league for a number of years with no problems at all. The clock has been used over and over again each week for league and tournaments and we have not had function or service at this date. Yes, we would recommend this product and will purchase additional models when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Fade

customer_reviews.title: excellent scoreboard
customer_reviews.text: this scoreboard does exactly what my league needs it to. it is durable, works extremely well, and even the remote has excellent range.
customer_reviews.author: YL

customer_reviews.title: Great Tabletop Scoreboard
customer_reviews.text: Great scoreboard. The numbers are bright and clear, exactly what I was looking for. The remote, although can only change the score and start/stop time, works great. The horn is more of a whistle, but I am nitpicking. Overall the scoreboard is great and definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy transaction, quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: I run a basketball league and needed a new clock. I currently own 2 others, same brand older models.
customer_reviews.author: Al Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent System!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic system for a small school gym. Spectators, players and coaches can clearly see the score and time. The remote is especially handy for scoring volleyball games on your on. We love it at our school! Very portable and we've had no issues with it in 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Pearson

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect, and so far has worked great
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for little league. It is perfect, and so far has worked great. Instructions are easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have used this throughout the season as a backup and it has worked great with no technical issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Devils Rock

customer_reviews.title: I was wondering if I could get a replacement sticker ...
customer_reviews.text: I was wondering if I could get a replacement sticker for the control panel I just received this unit one today
customer_reviews.author: James Wayne Wimp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use , Easy to carry, does eveything i needed it for
customer_reviews.author: Lenwayne Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great clocks great price
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, boxes in excellent condition, clocks worked as expected during testing. Haven't used them for an event but they look exactly as expected
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M.

customer_reviews.title: Keeping game scores
customer_reviews.text: We order this to be used in a high school in the Dominican Republic and we haven't have any complaints. It is a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Leandro Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: First scoreboard the fouls would not light up, replacement nothing would light up. Returned both went with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Carter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Both of the units we purchased arrived on time and were functioning perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far... very visible indoor with all the lighting and lightweight for transporting. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for...
customer_reviews.text: The church bought this scoreboard for our monthly basketball games and volleyball games. For an inexpensive alternative for a scoreboard this thing is great,
customer_reviews.author: Gpgeeps

customer_reviews.title: BSN Delivers with this Scoreboard
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with this electronic scoreboard. It works and works well. My only issue with the manufacturer is that they should implement something to make the unit "non-slip" by including some sort of rubber or material along the base of the unit. It has not happened yet, but I am always concerned that someone will accidentally push the scoreboard off the table because it slides so easily on a slick surface.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product before, and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley F.

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: the information and detail inscriptions was correct, love the remote that came with the unit, and fast shipping. used the product right away and work very well at the game.I got everything I ordered. awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: George Marcano

customer_reviews.title: Scoreboard Review
customer_reviews.text: Scoreboard works great. One change worth mentioning: the remote input functions should be reversed. Right side input for Home Team, Left side input for Guest. This would be consistent with the scoreboard inputs.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, but over priced.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon had the best price on this scoreboard, so I bought it here. The unit is what it is. I have others of these units and the "start / stop switch" is the first thing to break, so be ready to do a modification to keep your scoreboard up and working.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis F. Owens

customer_reviews.title: SSG/BSN Multisport Indoor Tabletop Scoreboard
customer_reviews.text: Use this for school athletics. It is very sturdy and can be used for a variety of activities/sports. The remote is a great added feature and works well. The scoreboard is also very easy to read. Great scoreboard for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read indoors. Many features. Remote is awesome, I can ref and keep score at the same time during scrimmage at practice.
customer_reviews.author: jay Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it has to do. There's even a shot-clock on the back (useful for friendly games only, with no display on the front).
customer_reviews.author: Sebastien Babeux

customer_reviews.title: I actually really like this product and the features
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like this product and the features... unfortunately the display screen has a defect in the wiring as the display will go off and on randomly along with different screen lights coming on even when not initiated. I will be returning this item for a replacement and hoping this was just a simple defective unit that perhaps got damaged in shipping?
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY  WITH CLOCK
customer_reviews.text: GREAT BUY, MY LIL LEAGUE TEAM , WILL BE ABLE TO PLAY MORE AT HOME NOW!I LIKE HOW IT CAME ON TIME !!!
customer_reviews.author: P-PLEASRE

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is super portable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters school sports team.Works great and is super portable and easy to use.Easy to see and the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: salabim

customer_reviews.title: New League and New Board.
customer_reviews.text: It took us 11 years to finally afford a scoreboard and it was well worth it. The buzzer startles people but still mile betters than what we had.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny velez

customer_reviews.title: Effective, lightweight portable scoreboard with user-friendly interface
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint we have about this scoreboard is that the buzzer sounds more like a whistle, high-pitched and rather displeasing to the ear. But, at least it has two volume settings (loud and soft). For our purposes, the soft volume level is adequate and less piercing. With that said, this is a very minor complaint.
customer_reviews.author: TDP

customer_reviews.title: Items Missing!
customer_reviews.text: The item was listed as being "NEW" There was no remote and no paperwork in the box (ex. instructions/manufacture warranty). I really needed the item, and did not have the time to send it back and/or wait for a replacement. The return shipping cost may have also cost more than the remote is worth, so I relunctantly chose to just keep it.
customer_reviews.author: mslizzzzy

product_meta.title: BSN Multisport Indoor Tabletop Scoreboard
product_meta.description: SSG / BSN 1240573 Multisport Indoor Tabletop Scoreboard (EA)
feature_bullets: Wireless remote for scoring and clock adjustments
Scores basketball, wrestling, volleyball, boxing and more
Use as a metronome, stopwatch, clock with alarm and program timer
Counts up or down from 99:99 and keeps score to 199
Includes period, bonus, team fouls and possession indicators
LED lit clock digits are 4.75-inches and the LED lit score digits are 4.25-inches

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
